named-native-query.name: Destination.seeDestinations
named-native-query.query: SELECT id, name AS nameD FROM destination WHERE state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Destination.seeDestinationsPerPackage
named-native-query.query: select dest.name from destination dest join package_destination pd on dest.id = pd.destination_id join package p on p.id = pd.package_id where package_id = (select id from package where name = :pPack) and dest.state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Destination.seeDestinationPerTripDestination
named-native-query.query: select name from destination where id = (select destination_id from trip_destination where id = :pId)

named-native-query.name: Transportation.seeTranportationbyDestination
named-native-query.query: select name, price from transportation where destination_id = (select id from destination where name = :pDest) and state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Transportation.seeTransportationPerTripDestination
named-native-query.query: select name from transportation where id = (select transportation_id from trip_destination where id = :pId)

named-native-query.name: TripInsurance.seeTripInsurancebyDestination
named-native-query.query: select type, price from trip_insurance where destination_id = (select id from destination where name = :pDest)

named-native-query.name: TripInsurance.seeTripInsurancePerTripDestination
named-native-query.query: select type from trip_insurance where id = (select tripinsurance_id from trip_destination where id = :pId)

named-native-query.name: Meals.seeMealsbyDestination
named-native-query.query: select type,price from meals where destination_id = (select id from destination where name = :pDest) and state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Meals.seeMealsPerTripDestination
named-native-query.query: select type from meals where id = (select meals_id from trip_destination where id = :pId)

named-native-query.name: Accommodation.seeAccommodationbyDestination
named-native-query.query: select name, price from accommodation where destination_id = (select id from destination where name = :pDest) and state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Accommodation.seeAccommodationPerTripDestination
named-native-query.query: select name from accommodation where id = (select accommodation_id from trip_destination where id = :pId)

named-native-query.name: Package.seePackages
named-native-query.query: select name, id from package where state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Trip.seeTripPerClient
named-native-query.query: select id,num_people from trip where customer_id = :pId and state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Trip.seeTripPerPackage
named-native-query.query: select id from trip where package_id = (select id from package where name = :pPack)
